actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to revise and modernize procedures relating to licensing by the District of Columbia of persons engaged in certain occupations, professions, businesses, trades, and callings, and for other purposes.
short_title: District of Columbia Licensing Procedures Act

summary.text: District of Columbia Licensing Procedures Act - Vests in the District of Columbia Council authority to revise and modernize procedures relating to the licensing by the District of Columbia of persons engaged in certain occupations, professions, businesses, trades, and callings. Directs the District of Columbia Council to make usual and reasonable regulations: (1) prescribing the qualifications required for persons to engage in a particular occupation or profession, including the establishment of classes of licenses and license fees; and (2) prescribing procedures for license suspension or revocation.

titles.title: District of Columbia Licensing Procedures Act

A bill to revise and modernize procedures relating to licensing by the District of Columbia of persons engaged in certain occupations, professions, businesses, trades, and callings, and for other purposes.
